extendedInfo.description: This flight computer comes with a massive amount of functionality to suit all of your planning needs. The list includes: PLANNED LEG (Hdg/GS, Hdg/TAS, Leg Time, Leg ETA, To/From)ACTUAL LEG (Distance Flown, Unknown Wind, Ground Speed, X/H-Wind)ALTITUDE (Density Altitude, Pressure Altitude, Standard Atmosphere, Cloud Base Function)AIRSPEED (Planned TAS (True airspeed, Actual TAS, Required CAS, Planned Mach#, Actual Mach#)FUEL (Fuel Burn, Fuel Rate, Endurance)GLIDING (Glide Distance, Glide Descent, Glide Ratio)WEIGHT AND BALANCEUNIT CONVERTER (Nautical to Statute / Statute to Nautical, Nautical to Kilometers / Kilometers to Nautical, Kilometers to Statute / Statute to Kilometers, Feet to Meters / Meters to Feet, Pounds to Kilograms / Kilograms to Pounds, Gallons to Liters / Liters to Gallons, Fahrenheit to Celsius / Celsius to Fahrenheit, Millibars to Inches / Inches to Millibars)COUNTDOWN TIMERSTOPWATCHCALCULATOR

reviews.title: Great ...
reviews.comment: for my Devices ... thank god - Nexus One, Nexus S and ASUS Transformer TF101G. My friend has no luck on his Samsung Galaxy 3 :-(
reviews.author: Gerhart Steiner

reviews.title: Nearly there
reviews.comment: Hdg and wind correction come up as -101.666 no matter what the input is. Some useful calculations, would be better if can change units eg gallons as well as lt in fuel burn and millibars and Hg for pressure alt etc. Small bugs eg 0\'s in background of figures etc, once fixed would make a great product
reviews.author: A Google User
